short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creative Professional Product Library - Capture and Access Anything Anywhere

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Wecora chrome extensions lets you quickly capture products from anywhere on the web to store in your library.  Using our chrome extension, a Wecora user can grab products from any website easily along with import product information to use in their projects.  In addition, the extension allows the user to browse their entire library from anywhere on the web without leaving the page they are on, as well as view history of product pages they have visited so they can find things they may have missed later.
